name: Dungeon Unleashed
description:
Argo have one purpose right now, get ou the dungeon, so, you need help him to come out alive. You can do this?

This game it´s my first project. All constructive feedback are welcome. I hope you enjoy the little journey.

Special Thanks to 0x72 for the free sprites that I use here.

Here's the link for his profile: https://0x72.itch.io/

Special thanks to Thales Caldas, João Victor e Chagas Junior for help with play tests.

Follow me here on itch.io for more news. And visit (also follow if you want) my instagram page https://www.instagram.com/aamazingblock/?hl=pt-br
